short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates timesheet entry with multiple rows and descriptions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Timesheet Automator  by Ankitkumar Singh is a handy developer tool that streamlines timesheet entry. 

It allows users to automate filling multiple rows with descriptions, specifying the  From Date  and  To Date  to efficiently log work hours. Simply input your project name, daily hours, and tasks to generate accurate timesheets in seconds! Perfect for professionals looking to save time and reduce repetitive data entry.
